channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: My Christmas Hero
channel.desc: When a young disillusioned war vet sees nothing good in his life during Christmas, a visit by his guardian angel shows him that his life really did make a difference.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Jolly Good Christmas
channel.desc: When by-the-book architect David hires free-spirited personal shopper Anji, he finds himself on a wild ride across London in search of the perfect Christmas gift.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Christmas Less Travelled
channel.desc: An old audio cassette of her dad's voice sends a woman on a journey to retrace her family's most memorable moments at Christmastime.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Lot Like Christmas
channel.desc: The owner of the most popular Christmas tree lot in Hudson Springs finds her business in jeopardy when a big-city marketing executive arrives with a chain store. Seasonal romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Mistletoe Secret
channel.desc: Seasonal romance following a ghost writer who arrives in a small town before Christmas and falls for the local Mistletoe Diner's owner.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Under The Lights
channel.desc: Emily reluctantly returns home to her family's rescue ranch to organise the Christmas Carnival to honour her mother, meeting a handsome artist along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sugarplummed
channel.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfil it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful...
channel.desc: Mrs Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire after their grandmother's passing.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Fabled Holiday
channel.desc: Talia and her childhood best friend Anderson unexpectedly reunite in a familiar looking town full of Christmas spirit.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Santa Tell Me
channel.desc: When Olivia finds a letter from Santa promising she'll meet the love of her life by Christmas Eve - and that his name will be Nick - she's stunned by three potential suitors.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Novel Noel
channel.desc: A book editor takes on a temporary gig running a bookstore, where her battles with the owner's son allow her to rediscover her passion for nurturing creativity.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Winter Palace
channel.desc: A novelist with writer's block becomes the caretaker at an empty winter chateau to finish her book. Seasonal romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas On Call
channel.desc: The lives of various first responders in Philadelphia intersect over the holiday season while juggling work, personal lives and their dedication to protect and serve their city.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Christmas Quest
channel.desc: When an archaeologist begins a search for an ancient Christmas treasure, she must team up with her ex-husband - who is an expert in Nordic languages - to find it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Mistletoe In Montana
channel.desc: Cowgirl Merry has been unlucky in love, but is she right to hope that her fortunes have changed when single dad Mark gallops onto her ranch and lassoes her heart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Three Wise Men And A Baby
channel.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together to care for a baby over the Christmas holidays.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Holiday Spectacular
channel.desc: This Christmas, journey back to the 1950s, where heiress Maggie is making her dream of dancing on stage in the Christmas Spectacular come true.

channel.desc: Recently divorced Melanie and her son Jason visit a remote island for Christmas, where the curt-but-cute owner of a lighthouse brightens her holiday.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Stars
channel.desc: When aspiring R&B artist Layla crosses paths with amateur songwriter Spence, she thinks she's found her shot at finally getting a record deal.

channel.desc: When young siblings receive a magic pen from Santa that appears to be granting wishes, they ask for their separated parents to be reunited.
